thread.title: Iraqi forces advance against ISIS on three fronts
thread.title_full: Iraqi forces advance against ISIS on three fronts | News24

author: news24.com
title: Iraqi forces advance against ISIS on three fronts
text:
Baiji - Iraqi forces advanced on three fronts against the Islamic State (ISIS) group on Sunday, flushing out pockets of resistance in and around Baiji and closing in on Ramadi and Hawijah, officers said.
Iraqi security and allied paramilitary forces last week launched a broad offensive on Baiji, about 200km north of Baghdad.
The city and nearby refinery - the country's largest - have been one of the worst flashpoints since ISIS launched a sweeping offensive across Iraq's Sunni Arab heartland in June 2014.
Anti-ISIS forces, including thousands from the Popular Mobilisation (Hashed al-Shaabi) force that includes many Tehran-backed Shiâ€™ite militias, have reconquered most of Baiji and its surroundings.
